pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GA for VQC Ansatz SearchThis is a module to support Variational Quantum Circuits by optimizing the ansatz. The ansatz optimization is performed using a Genetic Algorithm, which can be sped up with GPUs.## InstallationRun the following to install:```bash$ pip install ga-vqc```## ContributorsThis module was developed through the Caltech SURF program. Special thanksto my mentor at Caltech.- Jean-Roch (California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA)## Usage```pythonimport ga_vqc as gav# Config (hyperparameters) for GA, see full list in exampleconfig = { 'backend': 'simple', 'vqc': main, 'vqc_config': {},}# Create the GA with the given hyperparametersga = gav.setup(config)# Evolve the GA and search for the best ansatzga.evolve()```
